Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Lozano-Isla F, Benites-Alfaro O, Pompelli M (2019). “GerminaR: An R package for germination analysis with the interactive web application “GerminaQuant for R”.” Ecological Research, 34(2), 339–346. https://doi.org/10.1111/1440-1703.1275.
